channel.title: [PI] client background and login buttons
channel.description:
Umm...I have a quick question. In my client, I have absolutely no login buttons, or my client background in my sprites? I want to change them, but I can't find them anywhere. In PI is there a different method of changing the login buttons and client background?
I remember with delta, you simply found the client background in sprites, and pasted a new one over it..

item.title: [PI] client background and login buttons
item.dc:creator: @pimple pimple
item.description:
@pimple wrote:

It’s done through cache.
PI loads 317 cache, not 474.

If you want a tutorial on doing this, PM me.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] client background and login buttons

item.description:
@Near_hell wrote:

you have to find a cache opener and go into sprites in 474 cache oopener and then change it aroundd from their
